protocol.name: P-G5449-1
protocol.text: unopened flower buds of 5-week-old wild-type grown under LD conditions at 24?.

protocol.name: P-G5449-2
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 microg total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G5449-3
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions. And then purified with the RNeasy Mini kit.

protocol.name: P-G5449-4
protocol.text: open flowers of 5-week-old wild-type grown under LD conditions at 24?.
